attributes.action: We want Changing Places to be made compulsory for large businesses
attributes.additional_details:
These toilets mean the difference between able to go shopping or out for a family day. They are needed by 1/4 million people in this country alone. 
On the 11th May 2018 campaigners will be sitting on a toilet in a shop window in London to raise awareness of Changing Places, see below for the details.
https://www.facebook.com/events/1698641540195904/
attributes.background: A Changing Places is a 12m2 room with an adjustable changing bench, a ceiling hoist, a toilet, a sink and a privacy screen, they are needed for disabled people who can't use a regular toilet for the disabled.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "large businesses". 

We understand that you'd like more Changing Places to be available for the public. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask for all large shops and shopping centres to be legally required to offer Changing Places, if that's what you'd like to happen.
